oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of clothing, camp and garrison equipage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Documentation of 40 new shelter tents received from 1st Lt. Robert Gutermann, Quartermaster, 10th Tenn. Inf., USA., at Fort Gillem, Tenn. This fort, also called Fort Sill, was designed by Union Gen. Alvin Gillem and located in Nashville, Tenn. on the site of what became Fisk University, one of the first institutions of African American higher education set up for freedmen in the South.
